info.title: Alchemy Language Detection API
info.description: AlchemyAPI provides a robust language detection facility, capable of detecting the language of any text, HTML, or web-based content. AlchemyAPI identifies more languages (95+) than any other text analysis service, at extremely high rates of accuracy. Easily categorize or filter any content based on the language it was written in.
